Other Actions.Action 1: Howl, The Demilich emits a bloodcurdling how, each creature that can hear the howl must succeed on a Constituion Saving Throw or drop to 0 hit points.  On a successful save, the creature is frightened instead
Other Actions.Action 2: Life Drain, The Demilich can target 3 creatures, each creature makes a Constituion Saving Throw, taking an Average Damage of 21 Necrotic.  The Demilich heals for the total amount of damage dealt to all targets

Abilities.Ability 1: Avoidance, Of the Demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails
Abilities.Ability 2: Legendary Resistance, If the Demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead
Abilities.Ability 3: Turn Immunity, The Demilich is immune to effects that turn undead

Damage Resistances.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Magic Weapons

Damage Immunities.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Flight, The Demilich flies up to half its flying speed
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Cloud of Dust, The Demilich magically swirls its dusty remains, attempting to blind nearby creatures
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Energy Drain, The Demilich attempts to drain the Hit Point Maximum of all creatures near it
Legendary Actions.Action 4: Vile Curse, The Demilich targets one creature and attempts to magically curse them.  This curse forces disadvantage on all Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.  The afflicted creature can make a Saving Throw at the end of its turn to try and break the curse

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Demilich causes the floor of the tomb to tremble violently, attempting to knock creatures prone
Lair Actions.Action 2: The Demilich targets one creature, surrounding them with an antimagic field that moves with the target
Lair Actions.Action 3: The Demilich targets any number of creatures it can see, none of the targets can regain hit points
